title: Red king crab with polenta and wild garlic
description: Red king crabs are plentiful in the oceans around Norway - making this showstopping dish sustainable and delicious!
ingredients: 4 plum tomatoes, skins removed, halved, seeds scooped out and reserved
1 tbsp wild garlic leaves, finely chopped
2 tbsp wild garlic stems, roughly chopped
50g/2oz tomato seeds (reserved from the candied tomatoes)
1 small handful wild garlic, finely sliced
2 small handfuls rocket leaves, very finely sliced
8 x 60g/2½ oz king crab loin, cleaned
